definition[0]: an escape from a place or unpleasant situation, especially after committing a crime
note[0]: getaway car/vehicle/van (=a car etc used by criminals to escape after a crime)
example[0]: The gunmen made a getaway on foot.
definition[1]: a short holiday away from home, or a place where people go for a short holiday
example[1]: Big Bear Lake is a popular weekend getaway.
